context.note: Remember to set up the fm2dita.ini file with the file name template values (TopicNameTpl parameter) before starting this task. Once this parameter has been set it should not be changed without starting over at this point.

step.cmd: Open the book and all files from .
Place focus on the book file, choose FM2DITAImport Template and EDD.

ul.li: This imports the template and EDD associated with the structure application specified by the TopicAppName parameter in the fm2dita.ini file.

step.cmd: If the file naming relies on chapter numbering, set up chapter numbering in the book.
With focus on the book, choose FM2DITA Check for Topic Collisions

ul.li: If collisions are reported, fix the title text before continuing.
If filenames are based on topic IDs, youâ€™ll need to run Assign IDs to Topics before running this command.

step.cmd: Save and optionally close all files in the book.

ul.li: Place focus on book, press Shift and click FileSave All Files in Book
Place focus on book, press Shift and click FileClose All Files in Book

step.cmd: Optionally save the out folder to a new name (out-1?) to make it easier to roll back to this point in case something goes wrong.
